game.shortDescription: 1899년처럼 석유를 굴착해 봅시다! Turmoil은 멋진 그래픽과 풍자의 시선을 담은 시뮬레이션 장르 게임으로, 19세기 북아메리카 오일 러시에서 영감을 받았습니다.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Drill for oil like it's 1899! Turmoil offers players a visually charming, tongue-in-cheek take on the simulation genre inspired by the 19th century oil rush in North America.

reviewHighlights.text: I'm that guy's American gf that loves this game. I've done nothing but play Turmoil for a week straight. OIL
Funny little puzzle game! I am enjoyed my few hours very well. Would highly recommend if you like puzzle style or sim games.
